    • Leader [345pts]

      • Saurus Scar-Veteran on Carnosaur [215pts]

        Selections: [The Thunder Lizard] Prime Warbeast, Celestite Warspear, Clawed Forelimbs, Fusil of Conflagration, General, Massive Jaws

        Categories: CARNOSAUR, HERO, ORDER, SERAPHON, MONSTER, SAURUS, SCAR-VETERAN, Leader, Behemoth, COALESCED, THUNDER LIZARD, General, Artefact

        (Wounds Suffered) Carnosaur: 00-02, 03-04, 05-07, 08-09, 10+, Artefact: Fusil of Conflagration, Command Abilities: Saurian Savagery, Command Trait: Prime Warbeast, Unit: Saurus Scar-Veteran on Carnosaur, Unit Abilities: Blood Frenzy, Celestite Warspear, Cold Ferocity, Pinned Down, Terror, Weapon: Celestite Warspear (Scar-Veteran), Clawed Forelimbs, Massive Jaws

        Artefact Artefact Details Ref
        Fusil of Conflagration In your shooting phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within 12" of the bearer and visible to them and roll a dice. On a 1 this artefact cannot be used again for the rest of the battle. On a 2-3 nothing happens. On a 4-5 that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. On a 6 that enemy unit suffers D6 mortal wounds. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Saurian Savagery You can use this command ability in the combat phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly SAURUS unit wholly within 18" of a friendly model with this command ability. Until the end of that phase, if the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a melee weapon by that friendly SAURUS unit is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit. A unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per phase. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Command Trait Command Trait Details Ref
        Prime Warbeast Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of the weapons used by this general's mount. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Saurus Scar-Veteran on Carnosaur *1284+ Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Blood Frenzy If any enemy models are slain by wounds inflicted by this model’s attacks, for the rest of the battle this model can run and still charge in the same turn. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Celestite Warspear Add 1 to the Damage characteristic of this unit’s Celestite Warspears if this unit made a charge move in the same turn. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Cold Ferocity If the unmodified hit roll for an attack made with a Celestite weapon by this model is 6, that attack scores 2 hits on the target instead of 1. Make a wound and save roll for each hit. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Pinned Down Add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with Massive Jaws if the target has a Wounds characteristic of 7 or less. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Terror Subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of enemy units while they are within 3" of any friendly units with this ability. Order Battletome - Seraphon

        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 512"If successfully cast, at the start of any 1 phase before your next hero phase, you can pick 1 enemy unit within range and visible to the caster. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If that unit is within 3" of the caster, it suffers D3 mortal wounds instead of 1.
        Blazing Starlight 618"If successfully cast, pick 1 enemy unit within 18" of the caster and visible to them. Until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that unit. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Mystic Shield 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly unit wholly within range and visible to the caster. Add 1 to save rolls for attacks that target that unit until your next hero phase.

        Astral Herald At the start of your hero phase, roll a dice for this model. On a 5+, you receive 1 command point. Order Battletome - Seraphon

If you do so, until your next hero phase, if the unmodified wound roll for an attack made by that unit is 6, that attack inflicts 1 mortal wound on the target in addition to any normal damage. A unit cannot benefit from this ability more than once per phase. Order Battletome - Seraphon

        Deadly Cargo Once per battle, after this unit finishes a move, you can pick 1 enemy unit and roll 1 dice for each model in this unit that passed across any models from that enemy unit. For each 4+, that enemy unit suffers D3 mortal wounds. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Fly This unit can fly.

    • Allegiance

      • Allegiance

        Categories: Allegiance

        • Allegiance: Seraphon

          Battle Trait: Bound Endless Spells, Contemplation of the Ancient Ones, Secret Asterisms, Secret Asterisms: The Great Drake, The Hunter's Steed, The Sage's Staff

          • Coalesced

            Selections: The Thunder Lizard

            Categories: COALESCED

            Battle Trait: Cold-blooded, Predatory Fighters, Primeval Domain, Scaly Skin, Command Abilities: Trove of the Old One Technology, Unit Abilities: Mighty Beasts of War


        Battle Trait Battle Trait Details Ref
        Bound Endless Spells Endless spells summoned by SERAPHON WIZARDS are bonded to the model that summoned them. A bonded endless spell is always controlled by the model to which it is bonded. A model cannot be bonded to more than one endless spell at the same time and cannot attempt to summon other endless spells while it is bonded. If the model that summoned the endless spell is removed from play, then the endless spell is removed from play.
        Cold-blooded Ignore modifiers (positive or negative) to the bravery characteristic of COALESCED units. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Contemplation of the Ancient Ones At the end of your hero phase, you can pick 1 friendly SLANN and replace the spell they know from the Lore of Celestial Dominion table with a new spell from that table. Choose or roll for the new spell, rolling again if you generate the spell the SLANN already had. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Predatory Fighters Add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of jaws weapons used by COALESCED units. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Primeval Domain If a terrain feature is partially or wholly within the territory of a COALESCED army, then it has the Mystical and Deadly Mysterious Terrain scenery rules (section 28.1.3 of the core rules) in addition to any other Mysterious Terrain scenery rules it may have. The Mystical scenery rule for these terrain features only applies to COALESCED units, while the Deadly scenery rule for these terrain features does not affect Coalesced units. Battletome: Seraphon Errata, July 2021 p1
        Scaly Skin Subtract 1 from the damage inflicted by each successful attack that targets a COALESCED unit (to a minimum of 1). Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Secret Asterisms At the start of your hero phase, you can pick 1 of the following asterisms to be in ascendance until your next hero phase: The Great Drake, The Hunter's Steed, or The Sage's Staff. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Trove of the Old One Technology You can use this command ability at the end of your shooting phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly THUNDER LIZARD BASTILADON or friendly THUNDER LIZARD ENGINE OF THE GODS that is wholly within 18" of a friendly THUNDER LIZARD HERO. If that unit is a BASTILADON, it can shoot with its Solar Engine even if it has already done so in that phase. If that unit is an ENGINE OF THE GODS, you can make a cosmic engine roll for it even if you have already done so in that phase. A unit cannot benefit from this command ability more than once per phase. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        Secret Asterisms Effect Ref
        The Great Drake In the combat phase, pick a friendly SERAPHON HERO. Until the end of that phase, you can add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by the HERO. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        The Hunter's Steed Add 1 to run and charge rolls for friendly SERAPHON units. Order Battletome - Seraphon
        The Sage's Staff At the start of the hero phase, pick 1 friendly SERAPHON WIZARD. You can add 1 to casting and dispelling rolls for that WIZARD if it is your hero phase, and you can add 1 to unbinding rolls for the WIZARD if it is the enemy hero phase. Battletome: Seraphon Errata, July 2021 p1
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Mighty Beasts of War Add 2 to the Wounds characteristic of THUNDER LIZARD MONSTERS Order Battletome - Seraphon

    • Game Options

      • Battle Tactics

        Categories: Game Options

        Battle Tactic: Aggressive Expansion, Bring It Down!, Broken Ranks, Conquer, Ferocious Advance, Monstrous Takeover, Savage Spearhead, Slay the Warlord


        Battle Tactic Description Ref
        Aggressive Expansion When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 2 objective markers on the battlefield that are not wholly within your territory. You complete this battle tactic if you control both objective markers at the end of this turn.
        Bring It Down! When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 enemy MONSTER on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that unit is destroyed during this turn. If that enemy MONSTER was destroyed by an attack made by a friendly MONSTER or an ability of a friendly MONSTER, score 1 additional victory point.
        Broken Ranks When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 Battleline unit from your opponent’s starting army on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that unit is destroyed during this turn. If that unit was destroyed by an attack made by a friendly MONSTER or an ability of a friendly MONSTER, score 1 additional victory point.
        Conquer When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 objective marker on the battlefield that your opponent controls. You complete this battle tactic if you control that objective marker at the end of this turn.
        Ferocious Advance When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 3 different units from your starting army on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if all of the units you picked run in the following movement phase and finish that run within 3" of each other. If all 3 of those units are MONSTERS, score 1 additional victory point.
        Monstrous Takeover When you reveal this battle tactic, pick 1 MONSTER from your starting army on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if that MONSTER is contesting an objective marker that you control at the end of this turn, and that objective marker is not contested by an enemy MONSTER.
        Savage Spearhead You complete this battle tactic if there are 2 or more units from your starting army wholly within your opponent’s territory at the end of this turn. If 2 or more of those units are MONSTERS, score 1 additional victory point.
        Slay the Warlord You complete this battle tactic if the model chosen to be your opponent’s general is slain during this turn. If that model was destroyed by an attack made by a friendly MONSTER or an ability of a friendly MONSTER, score 1 additional victory point.

      • Game Type

        Selections: 1000 Points - Vanguard

        Categories: Game Options, Vanguard

      • Grand Strategy

        Selections: Beast Master

        Categories: Game Options, Grand Strategy

        Grand Strategy: Beast Master


        Grand Strategy Description Ref
        Beast Master When the battle ends, you complete this grand strategy if there are any MONSTERS from your starting army on the battlefield.

      • Realm of Battle

        Selections: Battle: Ghur

        Categories: Game Options

        Command Abilities: Feral Roar, Special Rules: Predators and Prey, Seismic Shift, Spell: Metamorphosis


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Feral Roar You can use this command ability at the start of the combat phase. The unit that receives the command must be a MONSTER. Until the end of that phase, when you look up a value on that unit's damage table, it is treated as if it has suffered 0 wounds.
        Special Rules Description Ref
        Predators and Prey Once per battle round, you score 1 additional victory point if any enemy MONSTERS were slain in that battle round.
        Seismic Shift At the start of the third battle round, after the players roll off to determine who has the first turn, the player taking the second turn in that battle round can pick 1 objective marker on the battlefield and remove it from play.
        Spell Casting ValueRangeDescription Ref
        Metamorphosis 512"If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly HERO that is not a MONSTER and that is within range and visible to the caster. That HERO gains the MONSTER keyword until your next hero phase.

      • Triumphs

        Selections: Indomitable

        Categories: Game Options, Triumph

        Triumph: Indomitable


        Triumph Description Ref
        Indomitable Once per battle, after you take a battleshock test for a friendly unit, you can say it is indomitable. If you do so, no models from that unit will flee in that battleshock phase.

Force Rules

Seraphon Battle Traits:
Might of the Starborne: Pick 1 objective on the battlefield. You complete this battle tactic if you summon a f riendly unit that has a CCP cost of 20 or more during the turn, and that unit is wholly within 12" of the objective you picked.

Stampede of Scales: Pick 3 different friendly MONSTERS. You complete this battle tactic if all of the units you picked run in the following movement phase and finish that run within 6" of each other and wholly within enemy territory. ()
